/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is filled with cars and buses, indicating a busy time of day. Buildings of various sizes and designs line the street, showcasing the architectural diversity of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, suggesting a sunny day. The sun shines brightly, illuminating the scene and casting shadows that add depth to the image. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the blue of the sky contrasting with the various hues of the buildings and vehicles.
